text: Mike Rowe is an American stock car racing driver from Turner, Maine and has the most win of any Maine driver in Maine racing history. He currently competes weekly at Beech Ridge Motor Speedway and part-time on the Pro All Stars Series Super Late model tour. He is a three-time winner of the Oxford 250https://bangordailynews.com/2018/08/24/sports/auto-racing- sports/this-68-year-old-auto-racer-has-no-plans-to-retire/ ==References== Category:Racing drivers from Maine Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:People from Turner, Maine
title: Mike Rowe (racing)
